title: Avenge the Ironhands
content: e main door (X:-292 Y:-172) you will need to pass the Sleight of Hand Dexterity Skill Check with a DC of 20 to lock pick the door. Once you head in, you will have to look for Gondian Zanner Toobin. The door to the security office (X:-311 Y:-165) is locked, you will need to pass the Sleight of Hand Dexterity Skill Check with a DC of 15 to lock pick the door. Gondian Zanner Toobin should be inside. (You can jump to Steel Watch Foundary through See Queen's Temple) (Infiltrate Steel Watch Foundary f
